Verses: 1 maanaanadhu Neerodaigalai Vaanjiththuk Kadharuvadhupola, Dhevane, En Aaththumaa Ummai Vaanjiththuk Kadharugiradhu.
2 en Aaththumaa Dhevanmel, Jeevanulla Dhevanmeleye Thaagamaayirukkiradhu; Naan Eppozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Sannidhiyil Vandhu Nirpen?
3 un Dhevan Enge Endru Avargal Naaldhorum Ennidaththil Sollugirapadiyaal, Iravum Pagalum En Kanneere Enakku Unavaayitru.

4 munne Naan Pandigaiyai Aasarikkira Janangalode Kooda Nadandhu, Koottaththin Kalippum Thudhiyumaana Saththaththode Dhevaalayaththirkup Poivaruvene; Ivaigalai Naan Ninaikkumbodhu En Ullam Enakkulle Urugugiradhu.
5 en Aaththumaave, Nee En Kalangugiraai? En Enakkul Thiyangugiraai? Dhevanai Nokkik Kaaththiru; Avar Samugaththu Ratchippinimiththam Naan Innum Avaraith Thudhippen.
6 en Dhevane, En Aaththumaa Enakkul Kalangugiradhu; Aagaiyaal Yordhaan Dhesaththilum Ermon Malaigalilum Sirumalaiyilumirundhu Ummai Ninaikkiren.
7 umadhu Madhagugalin Iraichchalaal Aazhaththai Aazham Kooppidugiradhu; Umadhu Alaigalum Thiraigalum Ellaam Enmel Purandupogiradhu.
8 aagilum Karththar Pagarkaalaththile Thamadhu Kirubaiyaik Kattalaiyidugiraar; Raakkaalaththile Avaraip Paadum Paattu En Vaayilirukkiradhu; En Jeevanudaiya Dhevanai Nokki Vinnappanjeykiren.
9 naan En Kanmalaiyaagiya Dhevanai Nokki: En Ennai Marandheer? Saththuruvinaal Odukkappattu, Naan En Dhukkaththudane Thiriyavendum Endru Sollugiren.
10 un Dhevan Enge Endru En Saththurukkal Naaldhorum Ennode Solli, Ennai Nindhippadhu En Elumbugalai Uruvakkuththugiradhupol Irukkiradhu.
11 en Aaththumaave, Nee En Kalangugiraai? En Enakkul Thiyangugiraai? Dhevanai Nokkik Kaaththiru; En Mugaththirku Ratchippum En Dhevanumaayirukkiravarai Naan Innum Thudhippen.
